definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="Scaling">Scaling</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="88" y="85"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="item_nbt_logic_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">lasering</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_issneaking"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="call_procedure"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"></mutation><field name="procedure">GenericConcussiveLaser</field><field name="name0">power</field><value name="arg0"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.03</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="item_damage"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="call_procedure"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"></mutation><field name="procedure">GenericLaser</field><field name="name0">power</field><value name="arg0"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.01</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="item_damage"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
